ARABIC: فَقُلْنَا ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَٰهُمْ تَدْمِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We said, 'Go to the people who have denied Our Signs,' and We annihilated them completely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then We told them: "Go to the people who have rejected Our signs." Then We annihilated them completely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then We said to them, "Go to the people who have treated Our Revelations as false. " So We annihilated those people utterly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We told them, "Both of you go to the people who have rejected Our revelations." We completely destroyed these unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We therefore said, “Go, both of you, to the people who have denied Our signs”; then ruining the people, We destroyed them completely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We said: "Go you both to the people who have denied Our Ayat." Then We destroyed them with utter destruction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We said: Go you both to the people who rejected Our communications; so We destroyed them with utter destruction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We said, 'Go to the people who have cried lies to Our signs'; then We destroyed them utterly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then We said: Go together unto the folk who have denied Our revelations. Then We destroyed them, a complete destruction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then We said, "Go together to the people who have denied Our signs." We utterly destroyed them!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We said: go ye twain unto a people who have belied Our signs. Then We annihilated them an utter annihilation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We said, ‘Let the two of you go to the people who have denied Our signs.’ Then We destroyed them utterly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We command: "Go ye both, to the people who have rejected our Signs:" And those (people) We destroyed with utter destruction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We said: "Go you both to the people who have denied Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.)." Then We destroyed them with utter destruction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Then) We said: 'Go to the nation who have belied Our signs' And We utterly destroyed them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We said, “Go to the people who rejected Our signs,” and We destroyed them completely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:36] Then We said, ‘Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs’, that is, to the Egyptians — Pharaoh and his folk. So they went to them with the Message but they [the Egyptians] denied both of them. Then We destroyed them utterly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We said: Go together unto the folk who have denied Our revelations) those who disbelieved in Our nine signs, i.e. Pharaoh and his people, the Copts. (Then We destroyed them, a complete destruction) by 400 drowning them.
